subtitles:
176920 179480 - Oh, God...
- Keep your shit together.
179560 182518 If you wanna get 'em out of here.

183320 185880 - I can pop these, no problem.
- So get to it!
199520 201909 Security, we have a break-in. Get the...

210040 212759 I know who you are.
I know what you think...

212840 216515 If you don't wanna get hurt,
keep your mouth shut and don't move.

216600 221628 The chimps are infected. They're highly
contagious. They've been given an inhibitor.

221720 225030 - Infected with what?
- To cure, you must first understand.

233280 236317 - What is he talking about?
- Get the cages open.

238360 242478 Listen, you sick bastard,
we're taking your torture victims with us.
242560 244073 We'll get you out of here.

244160 248631 The animals are contagious. The infection
is in their blood and saliva. One bite...
265280 267316 Get it off! Get it off!

270800 273872 - What's the matter with her?
- You have to kill her!

282200 285272 - What's the matter with her?
- We have to kill her now!

962040 964793 - What the fuck is going on?
- Just shut up!

972600 975068 - Covered everything.
- Who are those people?

1002560 1004710 - What the fuck is going on?
- Just move!

1033480 1038031 Man walks into a bar with a giraffe.
They each get pissed.

1040120 1045114 The man goes to leave and the barman says
"Oi! You can't leave that lying there."
1045200 1049079 He says "No, it's not a lion. It's a giraffe".
1059240 1062038 You two should get on like a house on fire.

1068560 1071916 - Are you a doctor?
- He's not a doctor. He's a patient.

1076320 1082475 I was riding a package from Farringdon to
Shaftesbury Avenue and a car cut across me.

1082560 1086155 Then I wake up today in hospital.
I wake up and I'm...

1110680 1116676 It started as rioting, and right from
the beginning you knew this was different.

1116760 1120753 Because it was happening
in small villages, market towns.
1121600 1124239 And then it wasn't on the TV any more.

1124320 1128836 It was in the street outside.
It was coming through your windows.
1132560 1135279 You didn't need a doctor to tell you that.
1137800 1140189 There was something in the blood.

1141600 1146355 By the time they tried to evacuate
the cities, it was already too late.
1153200 1155794 And that's when the exodus started.

1159840 1163355 there were reports of Infection
in Paris and New York.
1165640 1168438 We didn't hear anything more after that.

1171280 1174113 - What's the government doing?
- There's no government.

1176640 1180553 There's always a government.
They're in a bunker or a plane...

1180640 1184758 No, there's no government,
no police, no army.
1186160 1189118 No TV, no radio, no electricity.

1189720 1193713 You're the first uninfected person
we've seen in six days.

1211360 1215194 Look, I have to find them.
They live in Deptford. I can walk it. OK?
1215280 1217748 You'll go and come back, yeah?

1231920 1236152 You never go anywhere alone
unless you've got no choice.

1238560 1242473 Only travel during daylight.
Unless you've got no choice.

1246480 1249916 We'll all go and find
your dead parents together, OK?

1264000 1267037 If you want her to slow down,
you'll have to say.

1424680 1428468 They died peacefully.
You should be grateful.

1434680 1438992 parents and my sister,
we went to Paddington Station,

1441520 1446640 hoping maybe we could get on a plane,
maybe we could buy our way onto a plane.
1447240 1449515 I remember my dad had all this cash,
1449600 1452797 even though cash was completely useless.
1454280 1457272 About 20,000 other people had the same idea.
1462600 1464830 I lost my grip on my sister's hand.
1466920 1469150 I remember the ground was soft.

1471040 1475238 I looked down
and I was standing on all these people.
1475320 1479108 Like a carpet. People who had fallen and...

1479200 1482988 Somewhere in the crowd
there were infected. It spread fast.

1483080 1486277 No one could run.
All you could do was climb.

1487840 1490798 Climb over more people.
So I did that. I climbed.
1490880 1493155 And I got up on top of this kiosk.

1495360 1500115 Looking down, you couldn't tell
which faces were infected and which weren't.

1500200 1503909 Then I saw my dad.
Not my mum or my sister.

1517440 1522389 We don't have time to get back to the shop
before dark. We should stay here tonight.

1524960 1527679 My room's up at the top.
You two can have that.

1527760 1530957 No, we'll all sleep in the same room.
It's safer.
1629440 1631635 Give me a drink of that, will ya?

1674240 1677073 - That's Mr Bridges.
- Were you bitten?
1677160 1679276 And his daughter. From four doors down.
1682400 1685198 Did any of the blood get in your mouth?
1721520 1723511 Do you have any clothes here?

1726480 1729995 Then get them and get dressed.
We have to leave now.

1730080 1733595 More infected will be coming.
They always do.

1761200 1764078 How did you know?
How did you know he was infected?

1764160 1767914 - The blood.
- There was blood on me. It was on you.

1768000 1773154 I didn't know he was infected.
He knew. I could see it in his face.

1773240 1777472 If someone gets infected,
you've about 20 seconds to kill them.

1777560 1782475 It might be your brother, your sister
or your oldest friend. It makes no difference.

1782560 1787759 Just so you know where you stand,
if it happens to you, I'll do it in a heartbeat.

1787840 1791879 He was full of plans.
Have you got any plans, Jim?

1791960 1796238 Do you want us to find a cure and
save the world or just fall in love and fuck?
1798800 1801268 Staying alive's as good as it gets.

1857600 1860592 What is it about tower blocks
and shopping trolleys?
1860680 1863638 Stop talking. It's a long way up.
1880840 1882831 Now I do need a break.

1901800 1906874 - Why didn't you say something before?
- I didn't think you'd give a shit.

1908040 1912113 You've got no fat on you
and all you've had to eat is sugar.
1914320 1916470 There isn't a lot we can do about that

1916560 1921429 except pump you full of painkillers
and give you more sugar. As for sugar,

1926920 1929832 Actually,
I did have a can of Tango somewhere.

2004040 2006918 - Open the fucking door!
- Where's Dad?
2007000 2009195 Let them in, Hannah. Let them inside.

2041240 2044198 - Selena.
- Selena. Good to meet you.
2058840 2061035 Calls for a celebration, I'd say.
2061120 2064032 Why don't you all sit down and...
2064120 2066953 Hannah, what have we got to offer?
2067040 2069429 We've got Mum's crï¿½me de menthe.

2079960 2082838 - Where are the bloody glasses?
- Middle cupboard.
2082920 2085673 Nah, the good ones. It's a celebration.
2107520 2110478 I know it isn't much but, well, cheers.

2138120 2143478 Sorry we couldn't spare the water.
Same with the toilet. The flush doesn't work.
2145080 2147230 You'll have to use the bucket.
2153520 2156034 Have to empty it each morning.

2156120 2159635 Just chuck it over the balcony.
No mod cons here.
2161440 2164432 Listen, it's late. We're gonna turn in.
2177240 2179515 I'll take the living room. It's fine.

2214720 2218269 - So what do you make of them?
- Well, they're desperate.
2219360 2222079 Probably need us more than we need them.

2232920 2237391 You should be more concerned about
whether they're gonna slow you down.

2237480 2241075 - Because if they slowed you down...
- I'd leave them behind.

2245360 2248750 Then you're gonna wind up
getting yourself killed.
2264160 2267277 You think I don't get it, but I do get it.

2269080 2272914 And I know I'd be dead already
if I hadn't met you.
2303800 2305791 We lost water pressure three weeks ago.

2305880 2309839 I thought we'd be OK with the water
from the other flats. Cisterns and tanks.

2309920 2312992 But it vanishes so quick
you wouldn't believe.

2328800 2332873 You can set up a plastic sheet
to catch dew and condensation.

2332960 2336555 Saw it on TV once,
but I can't make it work.

2351960 2354952 Jim, we're not going to be able
to stay here.

2363520 2367115 - There's been no broadcasts for weeks.
- Just listen.

2367200 2371591 Salvation is here.
The answer to Infection is here.
2371680 2374558 If you can hear this, you're not alone.

2374640 2378952 There are others like you.
There are other survivors.
2379040 2381156 We are soldiers and we are armed.

2384480 2388871 - Quiet. There's more.
- Our location is the 42nd blockade, M602,

2392320 2396074 - You must find us. Salvation is...
- Now it just repeats.

2396160 2398435 - It's a recording?
- Yeah, it's a recording.
2398520 2401318 But this is where it's telling us to go.

2404920 2409516 The way things are, we might need
two or three days to get up there.

2415160 2420996 Sound carries in this flat. Me and Hannah
do need you more than you need us.

2421080 2424117 - Look, I didn't...
- No, it's OK. It's the truth.

2424200 2426589 I can't leave the block
if it's the two of us.

2426680 2430468 Something might happen to me.
Hannah'd be alone. I couldn't risk it.

2432280 2436398 If it's a recording,
the soldiers who made it could be dead.

2436480 2439836 - It's possible.
- That stuff about the answer to Infection...

2439920 2444038 There is no answer!
It's already done all the damage it can!

2444120 2446839 - Maybe they have a cure.
- Maybe they've got nothing.

2446920 2450833 - The only way to find out is to reach them.
- We could die trying, Frank!

2455120 2460592 And anyway, it isn't true what Dad said.
You need us just the same as we need you.

2463920 2468994 And we'll never be safe in the cities.
The soldiers could keep us safe.
2469680 2471671 So we have to try and get there.

2485240 2488835 Just so you know,
I don't take cheques or credit cards.

2516240 2519118 - What do you think?
- It's the most direct route.

2519200 2524228 Then we should take the indirect route.
The one in daylight and not underground.
2541120 2543509 No. See, this is a really shit idea.

2544360 2547591 You know why?
Because it's obviously a shit idea.

2547680 2551878 So we're gonna drive into the tunnel
full of fucking smashed cars...
2551960 2554758 It's really fucking obviously a shit idea!
2588960 2591269 The world's worst place to get a flat.
2591360 2594557 Agreed. I think we'd better do this quick.
2596960 2599030 I've got the wheel. You're on the jack.

2613040 2616430 Do you hear that?
Hey, hey, do you hear that?

2647120 2651238 Forget the jack, Hannah.
There's no time. Just lift, everyone.
2651320 2654437 Grab hold! One, two, three, lift!

2660640 2665555 - Don't look at them! Don't look!
- I can see them! They're coming!

2676000 2678798 - Get the tyre on, Hannah!
- I'm trying.

2691640 2693995 - Get in the car!
- Come on!

2767360 2770796 Don't take anything
that needs to be cooked, OK?
2770880 2772632 I think you can eat that raw.

2780000 2784312 If I never see another chocolate bar again,
it'll be too soon.

2788840 2792310 Now, single malt,
16-year-old, dark, full flavour.

2800080 2803197 Takes out the fire
but leaves in the warmth.
2855840 2858798 Either we do this now or we're walking.

2908880 2911440 Like going on holidays
with your aunt!

3005560 3008233 - Find anything, Jim?
- No! Let's get outta here.
3081080 3083958 I can, like, taste the vitamin C.
3084760 3087433 Mmmm, the raisins are so moist.

3146240 3149789 That you'll never hear
another piece of original music again.

3149880 3153873 You'll never read a book
that hasn't already been written,
3154880 3158555 or see a film that hasn't already been shot.
3162880 3165997 Um.... that's what you were thinking.
3169080 3171275 I was thinking I was wrong.

3182240 3186552 It doesn't really mean anything
to Frank and Hannah because...

3187880 3191190 Well, she's got her dad
and he's got his daughter. So...

3193760 3197230 I was wrong when I said
staying alive is as good as it gets.
3200720 3203109 See, that's what I was thinking.

3220160 3223994 It's getting late.
We'd better stay here for the night.
3251160 3253720 Selena didn't seem to have any trouble.

3269840 3273549 Bloody hell. Must've needed
a hell of a prescription for that lot.

3273640 3277758 I didn't need a prescription.
I qualified as a chemist.
3280360 3282828 Not only will we be able to get to sleep

3282920 3286469 but if we're attacked in the middle
of the night, we won't even care.

3286560 3288710 - Two each.
- Not for me, thanks.
3300680 3303274 Come on, Frank. Let her live a little.

3304320 3308154 - Give her half of one.
- All right. We're on.
3381920 3384593 You're having a bad dream, that's all.

3437640 3440996 - Did I miss breakfast?
- You'll sleep through anything.

3441080 3445870 - Did you have a fry-up?
- We'll stop at a pub on the way. Door!
3518680 3521911 The whole of Manchester, the whole city.
3523680 3525910 No fire crews to put it out.

3651520 3655354 I don't understand, Dad.
Did they leave?

3655440 3658432 - I don't like this. I think we should go.
- No!

3665000 3669630 Vehicles. We should check the vehicles.
There has to be something.

3781280 3784078 - Dad?
- Keep away from me! Keep away from me!
3784160 3786549 Keep away! Keep away! Keep away!

3915200 3919876 Well, we've got beds with clean sheets
and a boiler that produces hot water.
3919960 3922269 So you can all have a shower.
3922360 3925557 You look like you need one. Please.

3944680 3949674 It ain't funny. I got loads of
cooking to do, you fucking Doris!

3958120 3961157 She's lost her dad, Jim.
That's how she is.

3972960 3976396 Oh, don't do that.
Come on, come on, come on.

3980080 3984870 Hannah is what Frank says she is. Tough,
strong, and she'll cope just like I'll cope.

3984960 3988714 - Just like you'll cope.
- I don't want her to have to fucking cope.
3989960 3992269 I want her to be OK.
3993800 3995870 When Hannah had her dad it was OK.
3995960 3998633 It was OK for them and it was OK for us.

4037120 4040476 - Yeah, we did.
- We must be a disappointment.

4040560 4046430 You were hoping for a full brigade. An army
base with helicopters and a field hospital.

4048760 4052753 - We were just hoping for...
- The answer to Infection.

4057080 4061392 As I said before, it's here. Though
it may not be quite what you imagined.

4061760 4064558 - Just feel lucky to have found you.
- You were lucky.

4064640 4067632 The fire drove hundreds of infected
out of Manchester.
4067720 4070678 The surrounding area's teeming with them.

4080320 4085952 Flat terrain all round the house. Floodlights
which we've rigged up to a generator.

4089520 4093593 And we've been lacing the ground
with tripwires and land mines.

4093680 4098151 You wouldn't want to mow the lawn,
but if they get in, we hear them.

4101280 4105990 Secondary to protection,
our real job is to rebuild. Start again.
4106080 4108389 The belly of the house. The heart.

4108480 4113508 A wood-fired boiler providing us with hot
water. The first step towards civilisation.
4115680 4117716 Here you are. I'll swap you.

4117800 4120872 - Now don't be throwing it.
- Here, give us some.

4120960 4124839 Don't be fighting.
Will you put that back? Put it back.

4127280 4130158 - What are you cooking, Jones?
- Surprise, sir.

4153560 4158429 Mitchell managed to knock him out cold
and we got a chain round his neck.

4165800 4169679 The idea was to learn something
about Infection.
4191440 4194716 He's telling me he'll never bake bread.

4205880 4211034 And eventually he'll tell me how long
the infected take to starve to death.
4249160 4251515 ï¿½ You'll have to wait and see
4251600 4253750 ï¿½ Hope it's chips, it's chips
4253840 4256308 ï¿½ We hope it's chips, it's chips
4272040 4275271 Tinned ham, tinned peas, tinned beans and...

4282560 4284915 - It's a feast, Jones.
- Honour of our guests.
4285000 4288072 Absolutely. I was going to propose a toast
4288160 4291152 but this omelette will do just as well.

4306080 4309834 Jones, did you notice while cooking
that these eggs were off?

4309920 4313196 I thought the salt
might cover the taste, sir.
4319880 4322553 I don't suppose you can cook, can you?

4323360 4328593 I can't tell you how badly we need
someone with a little flair in the kitchen.

4328680 4333037 What a fucking disappointment.
I saw those eggs, I thought it was Christmas.

4333120 4336237 We'll have eggs again.
Once everything's back to normal.
4336320 4339039 You muppet! Look at him, eh?

4339120 4342999 He's still waiting
for Marks and Spencer's to reopen.

4343080 4347232 - You don't know nothing.
- I think Bill's got a point.
4347320 4350312 If you look at the whole life of the planet,

4352320 4356279 you know, Man has only been around
for a few blinks of an eye.
4357000 4359355 So if the infection wipes us all out,
4360320 4362515 that is a return to normality.

4366360 4369238 - That what you meant, Bill?
- Yeah, yeah.
4369320 4372437 Have you met our New Age sergeant?

4375200 4380194 Tell me, Farrell, exactly why
did you join the army in the first place?

4382880 4386839 This is what I've seen
in the four weeks since Infection.

4389520 4393877 Which is what I saw in the four weeks before
Infection, the four weeks before that...

4393960 4399193 As far back as I care to remember,
people killing people.

4399280 4402750 Which to my mind
puts us in a state of normality now.

4410720 4413553 - You're not eating?
- I don't want to eat.

4416400 4419517 I don't want to eat.
I want to bury my dad.
4420400 4423392 He's one of the people you're talking about.
4427320 4429276 Let's go, let's go, let's go!

4478960 4482430 What do you want, a fucking sweetie?
Keep shooting, you cunt!
4498440 4500635 I ain't never seen that in my life!

4522360 4527753 Listen, sweetheart, you ain't
gonna be needing this any more.
4527840 4529956 Cos you got me to protect you now.

4531680 4536754 You wanna get your hands on a really
big chopper, you just come and see me.

4538320 4540390 - That's an offer, Mitch.
- Give her some.

4546360 4550672 Easy, tiger. You don't wanna go
picking a fight with me, son.

4558080 4560992 - Mitchell, first action on.
- Resecure the perimeter.
4561080 4564390 Then get to it. Jones, Bedford, go with him.
4574440 4577034 Clear the bodies off the lawn.
4579800 4582268 The rest of you, go with him.

4603760 4607799 We're very grateful for your protection
but if we're gonna stay here...

4607880 4609359 - Who have you killed?
- No one.

4609440 4614389 Who have you killed? You wouldn't be alive
now if you hadn't killed somebody.
4621360 4624352 I killed... I killed a boy.

4635520 4640116 But you had to.
Otherwise he'd have killed you.

4660240 4663869 Eight days ago I found Jones
with his gun in his mouth.

4665000 4669516 He said he was going to kill himself
because there was no future.
4669600 4672353 What could I say to him?

4672440 4677434 We fight off the infected or we wait
until they starve to death and then what?

4678320 4681995 What do nine men do
except wait to die themselves?

4682080 4687950 I moved us from the blockade, I set the radio
broadcasting and I promised them women.

4704800 4706518 - What is it?
- We have to go.

4706600 4708591 - Jim, wait!
- No time! Come on!
4714480 4716357 We get in the car and we go!

4717680 4722037 No! You're not going to keep them here!
You've got to let them go!

4722120 4725237 You can't keep them here!
Stay where you are!
4725320 4727914 I'm not gonna let you keep them here!
4741280 4743510 I want to give you a chance.
4747200 4749395 But I can't let them go.

4776320 4778959 Smithers says
"Women and semen don't mix."

4779040 4781838 And Mr Burns says
"We all know what you think, Smithers."

4781920 4784718 And that was my favourite joke
in The Simpsons.

4784800 4788270 That's what they're doing a few
hundred miles away, across the Channel,

4788360 4792592 across the Atlantic. Eating dinner
and watching the fucking Simpsons!

4792680 4795831 They're sleeping in their beds
next to their wives.

4795920 4801392 But we're here chained to a fucking radiator
because the OC has gone insane!

4802400 4806279 Starting the world again when the rest
of the world hasn't even stopped.
4807600 4810592 Just imagine, just think about it.
4811600 4813795 How could Infection cross the oceans?

4813880 4817998 How could it cross the mountains
and the rivers? It can be stopped.

4818080 4820674 Right now TVs are playing
and planes are flying

4820760 4824594 and the rest of the world
is continuing as fucking normal.

4828720 4832156 What would you do
with a diseased little island?

4840560 4844758 "There is no Infection.
It's just people killing people." He's insane!

4889400 4892392 - Please...
- Believe me, I'm not interested.

4893440 4898355 You see, I'm gonna have the black one.
And I'm gonna make her squirm.

4898440 4902194 Mitchell, I swear to God
it's gonna end badly for you.
4905880 4907871 Get up, you cunt! Fucking move!

4931840 4935116 Come on then, you fucking pansies.
Do me first.
4935200 4937589 No, Mitch. Mitch, just use the gat.

4937680 4940592 - So you're gonna stick me?
- Shoot 'em!

4943320 4946232 Is that how you'd let
your sergeant go out, Jones?

4946320 4948151 - I'll shoot them!
- No, you won't.

4948240 4951550 You'll let him stick me?
Like a fucking dog?

4960480 4964268 You stupid cunt! What are you doing?
You wanna shoot me?

4964360 4968353 - You wanna shoot me? I'll kill you!
- Where's he fucking gone?
4969560 4972279 Fuck it! Get up! Get after him!

4974680 4977752 - Jones, move it!
- I can see him! I can see him!

4987120 4988951 - Can you see him?
- Through there!
5003800 5007110 He's over the wall. He's got no vehicle.

5044560 5048348 The first thing we're going to do
is make you look more presentable.

5048440 5051876 The lady of the house
has an extensive wardrobe
5051960 5054394 which she certainly has no use for.
5055360 5057112 You can't do it to Hannah.

5057200 5060749 Go to the master bedroom,
pick out a wide selection.

5073720 5076393 - It's only dressing up!
- No! Selena!

5076480 5079677 - I thought girls liked dressing up.
- Expensive dresses.

5097680 5101639 You need to leave me alone
with Hannah. OK?

5103440 5106989 - Listen, right. The OC wants...
- He wants us to dress up nice.

5107080 5111073 If you want us to get changed,
you have to leave the room. OK?
5133880 5136633 Come on, lads. Let's leave the room.

5158760 5162548 We're gonna eat these, Hannah, OK?
Come on. Eat these.
5162640 5164710 Are you trying to kill me?
5167040 5169474 I'm making you not care. OK?
5180960 5183520 Stay here and put the dresses on.

5189120 5191588 He went over the wall.
We thought he'd be dead.
5412240 5414595 It sounded like a Claymore to me.

5415600 5419388 All right, I'll go and hit the floods,
take a butcher's.
5422040 5424554 keep an eye on him, will ya?
5437200 5439589 I think they're having an effect.

5454520 5457273 What are you gonna do
if they don't come back?
5458000 5460958 Would you be the officer if Henry was dead?
5461040 5462951 Is that the way it works?

5466360 5470273 I don't think they are coming back.
I think they've been killed.

5488440 5491432 We're gonna get out of here.
Stay with it, Hannah.
5491520 5494239 Don't worry. I feel fine. Really.

5515400 5520713 Oi! Where the fuck are you going?
What's all the fucking shouting about?

5528360 5531591 Don't just stand there,
you soppy cunt! Get after them!
5553120 5555953 What the fuck you gonna do now?

5581440 5585035 - Defend these stairs with your fucking life!
- Hannah!

5756440 5760638 I haven't got any bullets.
I haven't got any fucking bullets!

5821440 5826036 It's just you and me now, darlin'.
But don't worry, I'll get you out of here.

5826120 5830398 Then we'll find a nice little fucking place
somewhere. Just you and me.
5830480 5832710 And we'll live happy ever after, eh?
5894440 5896829 That was longer than a heartbeat.
5910520 5913910 Listen. Listen. It's not all fucked.
5919440 5921829 We're gonna be OK. It's not all fucked.

5921920 5925117 - I've got to explain something.
- Shut up.
5933280 5936716 Hannah, it's OK! He's not infected.
5936800 5938791 But I thought he was biting you.
5938880 5941440 I was kissing her. Are you stoned?
5943680 5945716 We have to get out of here. Come on!
6132200 6134760 You looked all right in this, you know.

6155520 6158717 - I can't hear anything!
- I told you, I heard it!
6211920 6214718 Do you think he saw us this time?
